system.description:
You have some gear you’ve picked up since becoming aware of the supernatural world, mostly stashed away in the trunk of your car or in a bag you carry with you.

When you go to your kit for some mundane gear—road flares, first aid kit, etc.—useful to the situation, roll with Spirit. On a hit, you find something you can use that pretty much fits the bill. On a 10+, it’s perfect; take +1 ongoing to putting it to use in the scene. On a miss, the situation escalates while you’re trying to prepare—brace yourself!
